meta.defaultTitle: Understand Your Attachment Style & Relationship Patterns
meta.defaultDescription: Discover your attachment style, love language, and emotional triggers. Get personalized insights that explain why you react the way you do in relationships.
meta.keywords: psychology, relationships, self-awareness, emotional intelligence, AI therapy, personal growth, attachment style, love language, emotional triggers

hero.headline: Understand why you react that way in relationships
hero.subheadline: Discover your attachment patterns, love language, and emotional triggers. Get personalized insights that make your relationship patterns finally make sense.
hero.tagline: You're not broken. You're just patterned — and patterns can be understood.

hook.headline: We all repeat the same patterns in love.
hook.description: Why you shut down when your partner needs closeness. Why you give advice when they want comfort. Why conflict feels so threatening. Why you question if you're too much, or not enough.
hook.value: Withinly helps you see these patterns clearly — not through labels or quick fixes, but through gentle recognition and an AI companion trained in psychological depth.
hook.quote: It's not about what's wrong with you. It's about understanding what makes sense about you.

howItWorks.headline: See yourself clearly, at your own pace
howItWorks.subheadline: Self-understanding unfolds gradually. Each reflection builds on the last, and your AI companion remembers your patterns to help you recognize them in daily life.

step1.title: Notice your patterns
step1.description: Gentle questions based on attachment theory and relationship psychology reveal how you connect, express love, stay present, and treat yourself. No categories — just recognition.

step2.title: Get your first reflection
step2.description: A personal narrative that connects your patterns into something you'll recognize. See why you react the way you do in relationships.

step3.title: Talk it through
step3.description: Your AI companion knows your patterns and helps you see how they show up in real situations. Like having a wise friend who remembers every conversation.

step4.title: Go deeper when ready
step4.description: Unlock specialized portraits — Conflict Compass, Trust Map, Communication Decoder — or sync with your partner for couple insights.

insight.title: Your pace is the right pace
insight.description: Some days you'll dive deep; other days you'll just check in. Withinly adapts to where you are and remembers where you've been.

different.headline: What Makes This Different
different.description: Recognition over diagnosis. Patterns over labels.

dontOffer.title: What you won't find here:
items: Quick personality types that box you in
Generic relationship advice that doesn't fit
AI that pretends to be a therapist
Judgment about how you love or connect

doOffer.title: What you will find:
items: Language for patterns you've always felt
An AI companion who learns your specific emotional world
Insights that evolve as you do
Safe space to explore without being fixed or changed

different.tagline: Because you don't need to be fixed. You need to be understood.

trust.headline: Your patterns stay yours
trust.description: This is sacred space. Your insights, conversations, and growth stay completely private.

features.title: Your data stays yours
features.description: Never sold, never shared, delete anytime

features.title: Private couple insights
features.description: Even synced partners can't see your individual patterns

features.title: Built for safety
features.description: Designed to understand, not diagnose or treat

trust.tagline: Safe reflection is where real growth happens.

items.quote: I've been in therapy for years. This gave me insights my therapist and I are now exploring together.
items.author: Early member

items.quote: The report about my relationship patterns made me cry—clean tears. It felt like being seen.
items.author: Beta tester

items.quote: It's like having a wise friend who remembers every conversation and helps me see the threads.
items.author: Premium member

pricing.tagline: Pricing will be announced at launch. No subscriptions — just pay for insights that matter to you.

earlyAccess.headline: Be among the first to understand your patterns
earlyAccess.description: We're opening Withinly to a select group who understand that real self-discovery takes courage. Join our closed beta and be among the first to explore.

benefits.title: As an early member, you'll receive:
items: A personal welcome from our team

earlyAccess.urgency: No commitment. No pressure. Just gentle recognition of who you already are.

signup.headline: Ready to understand your patterns?
signup.description: Join the waitlist and be first to know when we open.
signup.privacy: We'll send you a personal note when doors open. No spam, ever.
signup.successMessage: Welcome! We'll be in touch soon with your early access.

couples.headline: See how your patterns meet
couples.description1: When you fight about dishes but it's really about feeling valued. When you both try to help but somehow miss each other. When love is there but connection feels hard.

coupleSnapshots.title: Couple Reports
coupleSnapshots.description: See where your patterns align and where they clash — with compassion for both sides.

testimonial.quote: Seeing our conflict pattern written out was like someone turning on the lights. We're not broken — we just needed to understand the dance we were doing.
testimonial.author: Emma & David

footer.tagline: Launching soon in English and Lithuanian

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. Think of it as a mirror that helps you see your patterns more clearly. Many people use insights here to go deeper in actual therapy.

items.question: What if I'm single?
items.answer: Perfect. Understanding your patterns before your next relationship can be incredibly valuable. Many users say it helped them choose better partners and show up differently.

items.question: How is this different from personality tests?
items.answer: Those give you a type. We give you understanding. Your patterns are unique, complex, and can evolve. We meet you where you are, not where a test says you should be.

items.question: What about my privacy?
items.answer: Everything stays completely private. Even if you sync with a partner, they only see shared insights — never your individual patterns or conversations.

items.question: Can this replace therapy?
items.answer: No, and it's not meant to. If you're in crisis or dealing with serious mental health challenges, please seek professional help. We're here for self-understanding, not treatment.
